title: Domestic PV wholesales up 3% at 3.4 lakh units in June: SIAM
description: Passenger vehicle wholesales in India increased by 3% to 3,37,757 units in June 2024, according to SIAM. Two-wheeler wholesales rose 21% to 16,14,154 units, while three-wheeler wholesales saw a 12% increase to 59,544 units compared to June 2023.
